SQL_STMT_U.val:
select * from lc_vw_gestaopedido
where cd_unid_de_neg between ':1' and ':2' and controle between ':3' and ':4' and cd_transportado between ':5' and ':6' and Cd_grupo in (:7) order by espera desc, Cd_cliente

select * from lc_vw_gestaopedido
where cd_unid_de_neg between ':1' and ':2' and controle between ':3' and ':4' AND Cd_cliente = ':5' and Cd_pedido = case when Cd_cliente in (select cd_empresa from GEUNIDNE (nolock)) then ':6' else Cd_pedido end
order by espera desc

SELECT COALESCE( ( SELECT DISTINCT CHAR(39) + RTRIM(a.cd_pedido) + CHAR(39) + ',' FROM FAPEDIDO a WITH(NOLOCK) inner join fapedido fap on fap.cd_cliente = a.cd_cliente and fap.Cd_unid_de_neg = a.Cd_unid_de_neg and fap.controle between ':2' and ':3' and fap.cd_pedido = ':1' where a.controle between ':2' and ':3' FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE ).value('.[1]', 'VARCHAR(MAX)'), '') Pedidos

select * from lc_vw_gestaopedido
where cd_unid_de_neg between ':1' and ':2' and controle between ':3' and ':4' AND Cd_cliente = ':5' and Cd_pedido = case when Cd_cliente in (select cd_empresa from GEUNIDNE (nolock)) then ':6' else Cd_pedido end
order by espera desc

ExpSyntax.val: 'Aprovado via rotina de gestao de pedido'

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select FAITEMPE.Cd_material, ESMATERI.Descricao, ESMATERI.Peso, sum(FAITEMPE.Vl_total_item_l-FAITEMPE.Vl_desconto) as total, sum(FAITEMPE.Qt_saldo) as demanda, isnull(and_qntdisponivel.qntdisponivel,0) as estoque, isnull(and_qntdisponivel.qntreservada,0) as qntreservada, isnull(and_qntdisponivel.qntdisponivel,0)-isnull(and_qntdisponivel.qntreservada,0) as disponivel, isnull(and_qntdisponivel.qntdisponivel,0)-isnull(and_qntdisponivel.qntreservada,0)-sum(FAITEMPE.Qt_saldo) as sobra,
CASE WHEN case when isnull(and_qntdisponivel.qntdisponivel,0)-isnull(and_qntdisponivel.qntreservada,0)-sum(FAITEMPE.Qt_saldo)<0 then 1 else 0 end = 1 THEN case when (SELECT MAX(lc_vw_tempo_producao.tempo) FROM lc_vw_tempo_producao where lc_vw_tempo_producao.Cd_material = FAITEMPE.Cd_material) is null then 'S/D' when (SELECT min(lc_vw_tempo_producao.tempo) FROM lc_vw_tempo_producao where lc_vw_tempo_producao.Cd_material = FAITEMPE.Cd_material ) = 0 then 'HOJE' when (SELECT min(lc_vw_tempo_producao.tempo) FROM lc_vw_tempo_producao where lc_vw_tempo_producao.Cd_material = FAITEMPE.Cd_material ) > 0 then rtrim(convert(char,(SELECT MAX(lc_vw_tempo_producao.tempo) FROM lc_vw_tempo_producao where lc_vw_tempo_producao.Cd_material = FAITEMPE.Cd_material))) when (SELECT min(lc_vw_tempo_producao.tempo) FROM lc_vw_tempo_producao where lc_vw_tempo_producao.Cd_material = FAITEMPE.Cd_material ) < 0 then rtrim(convert(char,(SELECT MAX(lc_vw_tempo_producao.tempo) FROM lc_vw_tempo_producao where lc_vw_tempo_producao.Cd_material = FAITEMPE.Cd_material)))
end ELSE ' ' END Tempo_dias, CASE WHEN case when isnull(and_qntdisponivel.qntdisponivel,0)-isnull(and_qntdisponivel.qntreservada,0)-sum(FAITEMPE.Qt_saldo)<0 then 1 else 0 end = 1 THEN convert(char,(SELECT MAX(lc_vw_tempo_producao.Data) FROM lc_vw_tempo_producao where lc_vw_tempo_producao.Cd_material = FAITEMPE.Cd_material),103) else ' ' END Tempo_Data,
rtrim(GEEMPRES.Cd_empresa) Cd_empresa, rtrim( GEEMPRES.Nome_completo) Nome_completo, rtrim(GEEMPRES.Fantasia) Fantasia, rtrim(vendedor.Cd_empresa) vendedorCd_empresa, rtrim( vendedor.Nome_completo) vendedorNome_completo, rtrim(vendedor.Fantasia) vendedorFantasia
from FAITEMPE with (nolock)
left join and_qntdisponivel with (nolock) on and_qntdisponivel.Cd_material=FAITEMPE.Cd_material and and_qntdisponivel.Cd_unidade_de_n=FAITEMPE.Cd_unid_de_neg and and_qntdisponivel.Cd_centro_armaz=FAITEMPE.Cd_centro_armaz
inner join FAPEDIDO with (nolock) on FAPEDIDO.Cd_pedido=FAITEMPE.Cd_pedido
INNER JOIN ESMATERI with (nolock) ON ESMATERI.Cd_material=FAITEMPE.Cd_material inner join GEEMPRES with (nolock) ON GEEMPRES.Cd_empresa = FAPEDIDO.Cd_cliente inner join GEEMPRES vendedor with (nolock) ON vendedor.Cd_empresa = FAPEDIDO.Cd_representant
where faitempe.Cd_pedido IN (select Cd_pedido from FAPEDIDO where Cd_cliente in (select Cd_cliente from FAPEDIDO f1 where f1.Cd_pedido=':1')) and faitempe.qt_saldo>0 and fapedido.controle between '12' and '26' and faitempe.Cd_unid_de_neg=(select Cd_unid_de_neg from FAPEDIDO where Cd_pedido=':1') and ISNULL(FAPEDIDO.usrpedi2, '01-jan-1990')=(select ISNULL(usrpedi2, '01-jan-1990') from FAPEDIDO where Cd_pedido=':1') and FAPEDIDO.campo143 not in ('E')
group by FAITEMPE.Cd_material, and_qntdisponivel.qntdisponivel, and_qntdisponivel.qntreservada, ESMATERI.Descricao, ESMATERI.Peso, GEEMPRES.Cd_empresa, GEEMPRES.Nome_completo, GEEMPRES.Fantasia, vendedor.Cd_empresa, vendedor.Nome_completo, vendedor.Fantasia
having isnull(and_qntdisponivel.qntdisponivel,0)-isnull(and_qntdisponivel.qntreservada,0)-sum(FAITEMPE.Qt_saldo)<0

SELECT FAITEMPE.Cd_material, FAITEMPE.Cd_unid_de_neg, FAITEMPE.Cd_pedido, GEEMPRES.Nome_completo, SUM(FAITEMPE.Qt_saldo) AS quantidade FROM FAITEMPE WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN GEEMPRES WITH(NOLOCK) ON GEEMPRES.Cd_empresa = FAITEMPE.Cd_empresa INNER JOIN FAPEDIDO WITH(NOLOCK) ON FAPEDIDO.Cd_pedido = FAITEMPE.Cd_pedido INNER JOIN getopera WITH(NOLOCK) ON FAITEMPE.Cd_tipo_operaca = getopera.Cd_tipo_operaca INNER JOIN esespeci WITH(NOLOCK) ON getopera.Cd_especie_esto = esespeci.Cd_especie_esto AND FAPEDIDO.Controle NOT IN('50', '45') AND FAPEDIDO.Controle >= '28' AND ESESPECI.tipo NOT IN('N') WHERE faitempe.Controle >= '28' AND faitempe.Cd_especie = 'R' AND FAITEMPE.Qt_saldo > '0' AND FAITEMPE.Cd_centro_armaz IN ('EXPE') and FAPEDIDO.campo143 not in ('E') AND FAITEMPE.Cd_material = ':1' AND FAPEDIDO.Cd_unid_de_neg = ':2' GROUP BY FAITEMPE.Cd_material, FAITEMPE.Cd_unid_de_neg, FAITEMPE.Cd_pedido, GEEMPRES.Nome_completo;
